item.description:
To celebrate the start of the Football season back home I have arranged for the pub to record the Port Adelaide v Geelong game which we will show at 2 pm.

Aussie beer will be on hand for us and Im in the process of organising some more Aussie goodies to raffle off, if we have the numbers I'll look into getting meat pies organised as well.

A.F.L. football games at the Pheonix will be a regular Saturday afternoon event hosted by the Boston Demons Footy Club, send me your email address if you would like to be notified each week of the game being shown and time.

(lets be honest, for some of you that dont care about footy its really just another excuse to get together and have a couple of frothies with a few aussies!)

Hope to see you there!

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: A.F.L. Footy Kickoff Shindig.
